parameters: \."Did he go to the second floor?!"
Can I trust you to the first floor?"
Won't it dangerous with just you two?!"
\."...Could be a dangerous date, for sure."
\."Well... If you're late coming back, I'll go help!"
\."No way! What if she's on the first floor?"
\."I'll search down here, and you two look upstairs!
\."Come back right away if you find her, Sara!"
There was noise on the second floor... What happened?"
\."I'm begging you! Please go check for me!"
\."Don't tell me these stairs lead to..."
But whatever the case, bet we gotta go..."
But I don't wanna throw 'em away..."
\."Dammit, it's just gonna be a trap anyhow...!
If we go, we should get everyone together first."
\."...But you heard about the Main Game... right?
We're gonna... pick one of us to die...?"
\."'Course I don't wanna take part in it.
But... how're we supposed to feel any unity...?"
We'll go up here when everyone's assembled."
\."Anybody tries to go up on their own,
act all friendly like before, though..."
"Hey! What the hell's with that guy?!"
"Look, miss Sara! There are these stairs here now."
\."Miley left a few spots of blood.
I'm sure she went up here."
\."I only just got here, so I dunno...
If you screw up... She'll kill you with your collar."
\."Hopefully nobody gets mad and goes after her...
go up these stairs on their own, but...)
\."You aren't thinking of going up, are you, miss Sara?"
\."I'm telling you for your own good...
there's something I wanna show you."
\."Come to the back of the cafeteria.
\.\C[4](I wonder what he wants to show me...)
\C[3]A card with Keymaster written on it.
It reads: "This is a key to the exit.
You will die if someone learns of this card."
A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.

\C[3]A stopper at the bottom of the bath. Small and heavy.
\C[3]A painting of someone holding a gun.
Has another painting on the back.
\C[3]A painting of someone holding a gun.
\C[3]A tool for spraying the liquid inside.
Droplets of water stick to it.
\C[3]A note with some names, including Prof. Mishima.
There's also the name Alice Yabusame.
\C[3]A painting of a man in profile.
\C[3]A light bulb for illuminating a room.
\C[3]A doll that looks remarkably like me.
\C[3]There are many exits out of the room.
